Uses of CxException in com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.exceptions
 

Subclasses of CxException in com.xerox.xrce.codex.jri.exceptions
 class CxLoginException
          CxLoginException is the class to manage CodeX exceptions at login action
 class CxRemoteException
          CxRemoteException is the class that manage remote exceptions returned by the remote protocols.
 class CxServerException
          CxServerException is the class that manage exceptions returned by the CodeX server.
